description: The male version of the üë∑ Construction Worker emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man construction worker emoji is depicted with a sturdy, determined posture, wearing a bright yellow hard hat and a high-visibility vest, all rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. The facial expression is one of focused effort, conveying a sense of diligence and hard work. This emoji is ideal for discussions about building, labor, projects, or any task requiring significant effort on Apple devices.
